content.body: Are there any existing proposals on giving the ability to disable ArrayBuffer's transferable-ness?
content.formatted_body: Are there any existing proposals on giving the ability to disable ArrayBuffer's transferable-ness?

content.body: From my understanding the buffer for WebAssembly.Memory is special in that it can't be transferred.
content.formatted_body: From my understanding the buffer for WebAssembly.Memory is special in that it can't be transferred.

content.body: So arguable there are use cases for the ability to disable its transferable-ness
